line.text: If the dull substance of my flesh were thought
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Injurious distance should not stop my way
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For then despite of space I would be brought
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: From limits far remote where thou dost stay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No matter then although my foot did stand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Upon the farthest earth removed from thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For nimble thought can jump both sea and land
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As soon as think the place where he would be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But ah thought kills me that I am not thought
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To leap large lengths of miles when thou art gone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But that so much of earth and water wrought
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I must attend time leisure with my moan
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Receiving nought by elements so slow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But heavy tears badges of either woe
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
